name: Hard Beyond "Rent" - Adam Pascal Quiz / Test | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which role did Adam originate in the Elton John and Tim Rice musical "Aida"?
questions.explanation:
Radames.

	Adam played Radames, captain of the guard, in the musical "Aida", which also starred Sherie Rene Scott as Amneris and Heather Headley as Aida. "Aida" opened on March 3rd, 2000 and closed on September 5th, 2004.

questions.text: Adam was born in Long Island.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Adam was born in the Bronx in 1970, but he was raised in Syosset, Long Island. Syosset is known for its schools; students often perform exceptionally well on the SAT. Adam's score is not known.

questions.text: Adam was once in a band named "Mute".
questions.explanation:
True.

	"Mute" was one of Adam's early bands. Some posters for the band can be seen in the loft where much of the action in the movie version of "Rent" takes place.

questions.text: Adam appeared in an episode of "Cold Case", playing a murder victim. What was his character's name?
questions.explanation:
Dennis Hofferman.

	The episode, "Wilkommen" aired on April 2, 2006. As the title implies, the plot dealt with an amateur theatre company putting on a production of Kander and Ebb's musical "Cabaret".

questions.text: Adam sang in the workshop version of this Disney musical.
questions.explanation:
Tarzan.

	"Tarzan" debuted on Broadway in 2006 with Josh Strickland in the title role, with Jenn Gambatese and Tim Jerome playing notable supporting roles. It was panned by many critics.

questions.text: Adam appeared in this movie musical, playing Nicholi.
questions.explanation:
Temptation.

	"Temptation" starred Manley Pope, who had also played the role of Roger in "Rent", and Michael Cerveris, who has had a career in rock music. It was a modern retelling of "Faust", where a character made a deal with the Devil. The film was first seen at the New York Musical Festival on September 27th, 2004.

questions.text: Adam played the Emcee in a regional production of "Cabaret"
questions.explanation:
False.

	While Adam DID play the Emcee in "Cabaret", he played it on Broadway, not in regional theatre. Other people who have played the role include Alan Cumming, Joel Gray, Norbert Leo Butz and Neil Patrick Harris. Adam starred in the role from October 17, 2003 to January 4, 2004.

questions.text: Up until his debut in the stage version of "Rent", Adam always had a problem while singing. What was it?
questions.correct: He sang with his eyes closed
options: He sang with only half of his mouth
He sang with his fists clenched
questions.explanation:
He sang with his eyes closed.

	On the Rent DVD, Adam claims that this was the only problem Jonathan Larson had with his singing. It was never a problem again. The movie version of "Rent" debuted in theaters on November 23, 2005.

questions.text: In which segment of "The 24 Hour Plays 2005" did Adam appear?
questions.explanation:
"In the Dark".

	The production gave one performance on October 24th, 2005, shortly before the "Rent" movie was released. Other actors who appeared in the production included Anthony Rapp, Terrence Mann and Kate Burton.

questions.text: Adam's first two children were a daughter and a son.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Adam's first two children were both boys. Lennon Jay Pascal was born in 2001 and Montgomery Lovell followed. Adam married Cybele Chivan in 1998.
